section.name: A few quick Wicket examples
section.p: Nothing says more about a development technology than a few simple usage examples. After all, how hard should it be to do something easy? The examples below should speak for themselves in demonstrating how easy it is to get things done in Wicket when compared to other frameworks. The 'Swingy' nature of Wicket is quickly revealed as well as "low touch" approach to HTML markup.

subsection.name: The examples
subsection.p:
This is a list of our examples described here:
HelloWorld: everybody's favourite
Nav-o-matic: navigation using links
Images: showing images
Tables: a little guestbook showing tables and forms

subsection.name: More examples
subsection.p: If you want to see more examples, why don't you check out our examples project which contains many examples and technology showcases for stuff as integrating Spring framework and Groovy.
